column1: Little Goat Diner////I really want to love this place
column2: but I don't. I don't love the food. Tonight was my fourth time dining. One might ask why go someplace you don't love
column3: 4 times. Great question. I usually go because a friend is in town
column4: or another friend who hasn't gone
column5: wants to go. While the food isn't bad
column6: it's far from great. It's not impressive. Not a whole lot of flavor. For example
column7: tonight I had the grilled cheese. While it wasn't bad
column8: it wasn't anything special. Yes it had olive & tomatoes
column9: but it lacked any real flavor. During a prior visit I ordered the omelet
column10: which was also disappointing. It's not a bad experience. Just don't go hoping to be impressed.
